lead_paragraph: SANDERS--Donald. Born NYC July 31, 1933, died June 24, 2016. Loved his family (who adored him), friends, Friday/Saturday puzzles, NYY, Tokyo, cooking, gardening and driving fast. Life was 'Terrific!' Linda & Family 1/3
